title: regarding pessat 2nd round counselling
content: Hello....can i  get cse at ec campus in 2nd round through pessat....( pessat rank - 2313 )

comments.body: Might get cs at ec campus or ece at rr

the cutoff for ec campus this year was 3k in 1st round

so are you sure I will be getting cse in ec campus?
When is the second round starting?
I got cse at 2203...so most probably yeah
i think you should sit for 2nd round .....there is a slight chance that you might get aiml in rr campus
yeah.... I'll also take cse in ec campus as I will be opting for  ms in US further....
I got CSE at EC while having a rann of 25××. So you might have a better chance.
